Finance Tracker

GUI using Java

This project had several features including tracking, calculating, and displaying a user's financial data. It was a great experience and opened me to the world of databases and more complex data structures.

  • Date: November 2020
  • Category: Java

Pong

Pygame package in Python

This Python project is a remake of the classic game Pong. It used the Pygame package and was useful in understanding the basics of developing games. This game included the basics of Python development and much more complex features of Python and plunged me into the world of software development.

  • Date: July 2020
  • Category: Python

Personal Website

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Github, VSCode

This website was a great experience for me. I learnt about HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and how to use VSCode and Github. I used a template and edited the HTML but changed aspects of the JS and CSS. I learnt how to use images and links to make my website fluid.

  • Client: Finish
  • Category: HTML
